This classic noir tale twists and turns down New YorkÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s mean streets and along HampÃ‚Â­tonsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ beaches and back roads during a bitterly cold and gray winter where nothing is as it seems and everyone has something to hide.
